author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM HONE CONTINUES CHURNING WESTWARD TOWARD HAWAII... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR THE BIG ISLAND...
summary:
...TROPICAL STORM HONE CONTINUES CHURNING WESTWARD TOWARD HAWAII... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR THE BIG ISLAND...
 As of 11:00 AM HST Sat Aug 24
 the center of Hone was located near 17.7, -153.2
 with movement W at 15 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Hone (CP1/CP012024)
